startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Avature career site URLs to scrape. Works with any domain using Avature (e.g., uclahealth.avature.net, bloomberg.avature.net).

subdomains.title: Subdomains
subdomains.description: List of Avature subdomains to scrape (e.g., 'company.avature.net'). URLs will be built automatically using the Subdomain Path.
subdomains.sectionDescription: Instead of full URLs, you can provide just subdomain names.

subdomainPath.title: Subdomain Path
subdomainPath.description: URL path to append to subdomains.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape (0 = unlimited).

proxyType.title: Proxy Type
proxyType.sectionDescription: Configure proxy settings for the crawler.

apifyProxyGroups.title: Apify Proxy Groups
apifyProxyGroups.description: Apify proxy groups to use (e.g., RESIDENTIAL, SHADER). Leave empty for default.

apifyProxyCountryCode.title: Apify Proxy Country
apifyProxyCountryCode.description: Country code for geo-targeted requests (e.g., 'US', 'GB', 'DE'). Leave empty for automatic selection.

scraperApiKey.title: ScraperAPI Key
scraperApiKey.description: Your ScraperAPI API key (required when Proxy Type is 'ScraperAPI').

scraperApiCountry.title: ScraperAPI Country
scraperApiCountry.description: Country code for geo-targeted requests (e.g., 'us', 'uk', 'de'). Leave empty for automatic selection.

saveErrorSamples.title: Save Error Samples
saveErrorSamples.description: Save HTML samples of error pages (404, 403, auth required, etc.) for debugging.

errorSamplesPath.title: Error Samples Path
errorSamplesPath.description: Directory path to save error page samples.
